description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to establish and operationalize a regional approach to the development of the electricity sectorinParticipating Countries by supporting the establishment of the ECERA.

condition.narrative: 3) All conditions precedent to the effectiveness of the two Financing Agreements, have been fulfilled. (Note this condition appliesto the agreements for both IDA Credits (49350 and 49360)
Conditions for Effectiveness (Financing Agreements, Art. V):

Proj Agreements, Sec I.A.2.(a) & (b): The Project Implementation Entity shall no later than 7 months after the Effective Date orsuch later date as the Association shall establish, recruit to the PMU, a procurement specialist and a FMS.

Thereafter, the OECS Secretariat shall: (i) ensure effective and coordinated transition of the responsibilities to the PMU from theinterim arrangements to be implemented at project effectiveness; & (ii) upon the establishment of ECERA, cause the PMU to beresponsible for assisting ECERA in carrying out Part B of the Project in accordance with the Financing Agreement.

title.narrative: Licensing rules enabling new investments in electricity generation designed

baseline.value: Independent Power Producers (IPPs) and Distributed Generation (DG) not permitted.

target.value: Licensing rules permitting IPPs and distributed generation established.

actual.value: Draft licensing rules drafted and reviewed by both participating countries.

target.value: Board of Directors for ECERA appointed.

title.narrative: Agreement signed by Participating Countries establishing the ECERA through Articles of Association/Incorporation

actual.value: Agreements prepared and shared with participating countries for signing.

title.narrative: Approved draft agreement, by the Ministers with responsibility for energy, for the establishment of ECERA

baseline.value: No agreement or institution in place for regulation of the electricity sector

target.value: Draft ECERA agreement establishing a regional regulatory advisory body is prepared for approval

actual.value: Establishment Agreement and Articles of Incorporation prepared and shared with both countries for signing.

title.narrative: Amendments to domestic legislation to operationalize the ECERA at a national level prepared, for review by the respective AttorneysGeneral

baseline.value: No legislative basis to operationalize ECERA at the national level

target.value: Legislation operationalizing ECERA adopted in member countries

actual.value: Legislation approved and published in gazette by legislature in both participating countries.

title.narrative: Full complement of staff for the ECERA hired

actual.value: Staffing will be reduced under proposed virtual ECERA. Hiring in January, 2017.

title.narrative: Self Financing Mechanism for the ECERA approved and operational

actual.value: Self financing report prepared and shared with Participating Countries.

title.narrative: ECERA provides guidance and recommendations on tariff design to the national regulatory authorities

target.value: Draft tariff rules designed and guidance provided by ECERA to national regulatory authorities.

actual.value: Will be implemented after ECERA launches

title.narrative: Design and adoption of cost reflective and performance based tariffs in the Participating Countries

baseline.value: Tariff setting process depends on countries and provisions in existing licences and policies adopted from time to time

target.value: Independent tariff setting process reflecting costs and performance

actual.value: New electricity legislation adopted in Grenada and St. Lucia establishes the means by which tariffs will be set to reflect costsand performance.

title.narrative: ECERA provides advisory support as a regional regulatory advisory body to the national regulatory authorities in the Participating Countries

baseline.value: No energy regulatory authorities operating in the participating bodies, and no regional advisory body.

target.value: National energy regulatory bodies receiving advisory support from the regional ECERA.

actual.value: National regulatory authority, NURC, established in St. Lucia. PURC in process of being established in Grenada. ECERA establishmentagreement and articles of incorporation to be signed by January 15, 2017.
